content: The Xu Dog is a friendly character and merchant you can meet in Chapter 2 of Black Myth Wukong. This character will teach you the art of crafting consumable medicine, and eventually allow you to invest in passive buffs.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Xu_Dog_Questline.md', within the main section titled 'Xu Dog Questline'.
The content is as follows:
The Xu Dog is a friendly character and merchant you can meet in Chapter 2 of Black Myth Wukong. This character will teach you the art of crafting consumable medicine, and eventually allow you to invest in passive buffs.
